TabDefinition.name: TabDefinition
TabDefinition.description: Represents a custom tab. Returns only the tabs that the current user has access to.

DurableId.description: Unique identifier for the tab. Always retrieve this value before using it, because the value isnâ€™t guaranteed to stay the same from one release to the next. Simplify queries by using this field instead of making multiple queries.

IsAvailableInAloha.description: Indicates whether the tab is available in Salesforce Classic.

IsAvailableInDesktop.description: Indicates whether the tab is available on desktop.

IsAvailableInLightning.description: Indicates whether the tab is available in Lightning Experience.

IsAvailableInMobile.description: Indicates whether the tab is available in the Salesforce mobile app.

IsCustom.description: Indicates whether the tab is a custom tab created by admins in the org.

Label.description: The localized label corresponding to the MasterLabel field in the Tooling API object.

MobileUrl.description: The URL that can be used to launch this tab in the Salesforce mobile app.

Name.description: The developer name of the tab.

SobjectName.description: The name of the sObject corresponding to the tab.

Url.description: The URL that can be used to launch this tab on desktop.
